did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Burton B. Turkus Arbitration Files, 1926-1982
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
The collection is arranged alphabetically by company name, except for Box No. 12 and portions of Box No. 13, which contain arbitration cases involving the International Organization of Masters, Mates and Pilots.
Except as noted, all case files contain an Award. Most files, however, include much more documentation as is noted throughout the description.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by company name, except for Box No. 12 and portions of Box No. 13, which contain arbitration cases involving the International Organization of Masters, Mates and Pilots.
Except as noted, all case files contain an Award. Most files, however, include much more documentation as is noted throughout the description.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Burton B. Turkus Arbitration Files #5712. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
